flounder.helpers

Class OpenGlUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.helpers.OpenGlUtils

  • public class OpenGlUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs basic OpenGL rendering functions.

      • bindTextureToBank

        public static void bindTextureToBank(int textureID,
                                     int bankID,
                                     int lodBias)
        Binds the OpenGL texture to a blank ID.
        Parameters:
        textureID - The texture to bind.
        bankID - The blank ID to bind to.
        lodBias - The LOD to load to texture at.
